projects.title: Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Data-Driven application.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: CMRiLearn -  Learning Management System
projects.bodyText:
- An LMS web app made using **Django** for **CMRIT** college.
 - Incorporated features like dashboard, course material uploads, assignments, quiz, quiz reports, discussion forum and attendance tracker.

projects.title: E-Commerce Rest API
projects.bodyText:
- Conceptualized and implemented REST APIs for an ecommerce website.
 - Features include Registration, login, placing and canceling an order for regular users. Admin can create, retrieve, update and delete products.
 - Improved response time by 115% using Redis cache.

projects.title: Sortipy
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a powerful and versatile playlist sorting tool for Spotify users.
 - Allows user to sort the songs based on a variety of musical attributes, including tempo, loudness, valence, energy, danceability, and more.
 - Increased the response time by 20% by pagination of query results.

projects.title: LabSpot Discussion Forum
projects.bodyText:
- Worked on a comprehensive discussion forum for the LabSpot community, providing a platform for users to share their questions and doubts and engage in collaborative problem-solving.
 - Intuitive interface and dynamic features.

projects.title: Moziety Form
projects.bodyText:
- Built a robust event registration platform designed to serve as an alternative to Google forms.
 - Tailored to the needs of CMRIT college clubs.
